statements.select:
SELECT X.* FROM (
SELECT A.MST_CD, A.NM MST_NM, B.DTL_CD, B.NM, B.ETC DTL_ETC, B.ORD FROM INFOUSER.CD_MST_INFO A ,INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND B.MST_CD = A.MST_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y'
A.MST_CD = #MST_CD#
A.ETC = #ETC#
SELECT '' AS MST_CD, NULL AS MST_NM, ' ' AS DTL_CD, '전체' AS NM, NULL AS DTL_ETC, NULL AS ORD FROM DUAL
) X ORDER BY X.ORD ASC, X.DTL_CD

SELECT A.MST_CD, A.NM MST_NM, B.DTL_CD, B.NM, B.ETC DTL_ETC, B.ORD FROM INFOUSER.CD_MST_INFO A ,INFOUSER.CD_DTL_INFO B WHERE 1=1 AND B.MST_CD = A.MST_CD AND A.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.MST_CD = #MST_CD# AND B.DTL_CD = #DTL_CD#
SELECT MNU_CD, SYS_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC, MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD, DEL_YN, EDT_ID, EDT_DT FROM INFOUSER.SYS_MNU_INFO WHERE SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ORD ASC

SELECT MNU_CD, SYS_CD, MNU_NM, MNU_DESC, MNU_PATH, MNU_IMG, UPPER_CD, MNU_STEP, ORD, DEL_YN, EDT_ID, EDT_DT FROM INFOUSER.SYS_MNU_INFO WHERE SYS_CD = #SYS_CD# AND MNU_STEP = #MNU_STEP# AND DEL_YN = 'N'
AND UPPER_CD = #UPPER_CD#
ORDER BY ORD ASC
SELECT HJD_CDE, HJD_NAM, HJD_EXP FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE NVL(USE_YN,'*') != 'N' ORDER BY HJD_CDE
SELECT HJD_CDE, HJD_NAM AS NAME, HJD_EXP FROM INFOFMS.CMT_ADAR_MA WHERE HJD_CDE = #CODE# AND NVL(USE_YN,'*') != 'N' ORDER BY HJD_CDE
SELECT FTR_CDE, FTR_NAM AS NAME FROM V_FTR_CDE WHERE FTR_CDE = #CODE#
SELECT FTR_CDE, FTR_NAM FROM V_FTR_CDE WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FTR_CDE

SELECT FTR_CDE, FTR_NAM AS NAME FROM V_FTR_CDE WHERE 1=1
FTR_CDE like #CODE# || '%'
ORDER BY FTR_CDE

SELECT FTR_CDE, FTR_NAM FROM V_FTR_CDE WHERE 1=1
FTR_CDE like #FTR_CDE# || '%'
ORDER BY FTR_CDE
statements.update: UPDATE $TABLE_NM$ SET GEOM = ST_POINTFROMTEXT(#WKT_POINT#) WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
UPDATE $TABLE_NM$ SET GEOM = ST_LINEFROMTEXT(#WKT_LINE#) WHERE FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
UPDATE $TABLE_NM$ SET GEOM = ST_MPOLYFROMTEXT(#WKT_POLYGON#) WHERE 1=1 AND FTR_CDE = #FTR_CDE# AND FTR_IDN = #FTR_IDN#
